file_insights.primary_changes: Added multiple database indexes for entity_linkages table

patterns_discovered: Database performance optimization through strategic index creation
Comprehensive indexing covering multiple query scenarios
Thoughtful consideration of common query patterns in index design
gotchas_discovered: Single-column indexes might be needed alongside composite indexes
Performance trade-offs between index creation and write performance

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Add indexes for entity linkage queries

recommendations: Periodically review index usage and performance
Monitor query execution plans to validate index effectiveness
Consider partial indexes if only a subset of data is frequently queried
